title: Lost Boy
description: There is one version of my story that everyone knows. And then there is the truth. Once I loved a boy called Peter Pan.Peter brought me to his island because there were no rules and no grownups to make us mind. He brought boys from the Other Place to join in the fun, but Peter’s idea of fun is sharper than a pirate’s sword. He wants always to be that shining sun that we all revolve around. He’ll do anything to be that sun. Peter promised we would all be young and happy forever.Peter will say I’m a villain, that I wronged him, that I never was his friend.Peter Lies.
author: Christina Henry
